name: Solo: Pipeline Bootstrap for Atlassian-Customer Consulting
summary: Bootstraps a consulting pipeline fast for a solo operator targeting existing Atlassian customers. Produces a 14-day pipeline sprint plan, wedge offer, ICP/triggers, outreach sequences, discovery scripts, proposal scaffolds, and telemetry events with strict minimum viable context.

selection.intent: Create a working outbound-to-paid-diagnostic pipeline in <=14 days for a solo founder with agent support.
triggers: No active pipeline or <3 opportunities in any stage
Existing service capability but unclear wedge offer
Target buyers are known ecosystem (Atlassian customers/partners)
anti_triggers: You already have a stable inbound funnel producing >10 qualified meetings/month
You are doing enterprise RFP-only motions with long procurement cycles and no ability to sell a diagnostic

allowed: web.search (optional for list building and ecosystem intel)
disallowed: claiming Atlassian partnership status unless verified in context

runtime_contract.idempotency: If the same context is provided, outputs should be stable except for randomized A/B copy variants which must be labeled.
runtime_contract.safety: Avoid deceptive impersonation; require approval gates before external communication.

definitions.wedge_offer: A narrow, low-risk, fixed-scope engagement designed to convert interest into a paid diagnostic quickly and expand into larger work.
definitions.paid_diagnostic: Fixed fee, fixed timeline engagement that produces tangible artifacts (scorecard, backlog, roadmap) and de-risks a larger implementation.

primary_outcomes: A single default wedge offer with clear deliverables, timeline, and pricing bands
A target account and persona definition with triggers and disqualifiers
A 14-day pipeline sprint plan with daily operating cadence
Outreach sequences (email/LinkedIn) and call scripts that close to a paid diagnostic
Telemetry event taxonomy to measure throughput (touches→replies→calls→proposals→wins)
